p:
Given the requirement of EM and given the nature of coronavirus morphology sought in such endeavors, there was some speculation that the laboratory findings could be over‐represented.
76 ,
77 For some geographic regions, the frequency of EM‐coronavirus morphotypes were equally found in symptomatic and control patients.
73 ,
78 ,
81 In these regards, some investigators believed that coronaviruses could not be confirmed as enteric pathogens even by 2003.
82 The discovery of Torovirus and its possible relationship to human disease also complicated the differentiation of viruses that could pose with the same morphological appearance to some observers.
